# viewDidLoad()

**Instance Method**

Configures the split view controller after its view loads into memory.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor func viewDidLoad()
```

## Discussion

[doc://com.apple.appkit/documentation/AppKit/NSSplitViewController] overrides this method from its parent class, [doc://com.apple.appkit/documentation/AppKit/NSViewController]. If you override this method in a subclass, you must call `super`.
title: viewDidLoad()
